channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Physics Equations Everyone Should Know
item.description: Our physics expert picks his top-five equations, plus a scheme to supply US power needs with a bucket of baseballs. Thanks, Einstein!

item.title: In motion to dismiss, chatbot platform Character AI claims it is protected by the First Amendment
item.description: Character AI, a platform that lets users engage in roleplay with AI chatbots, has filed a motion to dismiss a case brought against it by the parent of...

item.title: Wall Street banks plan sale of X debt at a discount
item.description: Bankers are reportedly gearing up to offload debt used to fund Elon Musk’s social network, for which he paid $44 million in 2022 including $13 billion...

item.title: Retro Biosciences, backed by Sam Altman, is raising $1 billion to extend human lifespan
item.description: Sam Altman-backed Retro Biosciences is raising $1 billion to develop drugs that extend human lifespan by 10 years, the FT reports. © 2024 TechCrunch. ...

item.title: UnitedHealth confirms 190 million Americans affected by Change Healthcare data breach
item.description: The number of individuals confirmed to be affected by the data breach is almost double the company's previous estimate. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights ...

item.title: ‘We Have Seen a Lot More Hate’: Trans People Are Already Terrified
item.description: After Donald Trump signed a sweeping executive order directed against trans people this week, trans and nonbinary people are scared of what happens ne...

item.title: AI companies upped their federal lobbying spend in 2024 amid regulatory uncertainty
item.description: Companies spent significantly more lobbying AI issues at the U.S. federal level last year compared to 2023 amid regulatory uncertainty. According to d...

item.title: Science Has Spun Spider-Man’s Web-Slinging Into Reality
item.description: When a US research lab accidentally created a sticky, web-like substance, it turned to Peter Parker and comic-book lore for inspiration on what to do ...

item.title: This Man Eats So Much Butter, Cheese, and Beef That Cholesterol Oozes From His Skin
item.description: High cholesterol is considered 240 mg/dL. The man’s was over 1,000 mg/dL.

item.title: DOGE Will Allow Elon Musk to Surveil the US Government From the Inside
